rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with smooth threshold and ramp leading into the main living area. Adheres to Vastu by keeping the front door oriented towards the east for auspicious energy.
Spacious open-plan living room featuring Bohemian design elements like eclectic decor and vibrant textiles. Natural light from large windows aligning with the West-facing plot enhances ambience.
Adjacent to living area; incorporates a foldable dining table for flexible use and includes provisions for wheelchair accessibility.
Modern kitchen with accessible design features such as lowered countertops and open shelving. Windows are positioned to allow natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Cozy guest room featuring Bohemian-style decor including layered textures and soft lighting. Accessible with easy passage for wheelchair users.
Spacious master bedroom designed for comfort and style. Features ample natural light from a large window on the south side following Vastu guidelines.
Accessible bathroom with grab rails and slip-resistant surfaces, ensuring safety and ease of movement for wheelchair users.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with ramped approach in accordance to local building codes and Vastu.
Large window for natural light ensuring compliance with Vastu energy flow.
Provides natural lighting and ventilation in the kitchen area.

additional_features.description: Spacious terrace on the roof with a Bohemian garden theme, perfect for relaxation and social gatherings. Equipped with ramps to ensure wheelchair accessibility.
